import _objectSpread from"/Users/eveyhuang/Documents/novohaven-app/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001/api';class ApiClient{constructor(){this.token=null;}setToken(token){this.token=token;if(token){localStorage.setItem('auth_token',token);}else{localStorage.removeItem('auth_token');}}getToken(){if(!this.token){this.token=localStorage.getItem('auth_token');}return this.token;}async request(endpoint){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const url="".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint);const headers=_objectSpread({'Content-Type':'application/json'},options.headers);const token=this.getToken();if(token){headers['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);}const response=await fetch(url,_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},options),{},{headers}));if(!response.ok){const error=await response.json().catch(()=>({error:'Request failed'}));throw new Error(error.error||"HTTP error ".concat(response.status));}return response.json();}// Auth endpoints
async login(credentials){const response=await this.request('/auth/login',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(credentials)});this.setToken(response.token);return response;}async logout(){await this.request('/auth/logout',{method:'POST'});this.setToken(null);}async getCurrentUser(){return this.request('/auth/me');}// Recipe endpoints
async getRecipes(){return this.request('/recipes');}async getRecipe(id){return this.request("/recipes/".concat(id));}async createRecipe(data){return this.request('/recipes',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data)});}async updateRecipe(id,data){return this.request("/recipes/".concat(id),{method:'PUT',body:JSON.stringify(data)});}async deleteRecipe(id){return this.request("/recipes/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});}async cloneRecipe(id,name){return this.request("/recipes/".concat(id,"/clone"),{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({name})});}// Execution endpoints
async getExecutions(){return this.request('/executions');}async getExecution(id){return this.request("/executions/".concat(id));}async startExecution(recipeId,inputData,modifiedSteps){return this.request('/executions',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({recipe_id:recipeId,input_data:inputData,steps:modifiedSteps})});}async approveStep(executionId,stepId){return this.request("/executions/".concat(executionId,"/steps/").concat(stepId,"/approve"),{method:'POST'});}async rejectStep(executionId,stepId){return this.request("/executions/".concat(executionId,"/steps/").concat(stepId,"/reject"),{method:'POST'});}async retryStep(executionId,stepId,modifiedPrompt,modifiedInput){return this.request("/executions/".concat(executionId,"/steps/").concat(stepId,"/retry"),{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({modified_prompt:modifiedPrompt,modified_input:modifiedInput})});}async getExecutionStatus(id){return this.request("/executions/".concat(id,"/status"));}async cancelExecution(id){return this.request("/executions/".concat(id,"/cancel"),{method:'POST'});}async deleteExecution(id){return this.request("/executions/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});}// Standards endpoints
async getStandards(){return this.request('/standards');}async getStandard(id){return this.request("/standards/".concat(id));}async getStandardsByType(type){return this.request("/standards/type/".concat(type));}async createStandard(data){return this.request('/standards',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data)});}async updateStandard(id,data){return this.request("/standards/".concat(id),{method:'PUT',body:JSON.stringify(data)});}async deleteStandard(id){return this.request("/standards/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});}async previewStandard(id){return this.request("/standards/preview/".concat(id));}// AI endpoints
async getAIModels(){return this.request('/ai/models');}async getAIProviders(){return this.request('/ai/providers');}async testAI(provider,model,prompt,config,images){return this.request('/ai/test',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({provider,model,prompt,config,images})});}async validatePrompt(prompt){return this.request('/ai/validate',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({prompt})});}// Executor endpoints
async getExecutors(){return this.request('/executors');}// Health check
async healthCheck(){return this.request('/health');}// Outputs endpoints
async getOutputs(){return this.request('/outputs');}async getOutput(id){return this.request("/outputs/".concat(id));}// Scraping endpoints
async getScrapingStatus(){return this.request('/scraping/status');}async scrapeReviews(urls){return this.request('/scraping/reviews',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({urls})});}async parseCSV(content,platform,productUrl){return this.request('/scraping/csv/parse',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({content,platform,product_url:productUrl})});}async exportReviews(reviews){let format=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'json';const url="".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/scraping/export");const token=this.getToken();const headers={'Content-Type':'application/json'};if(token){headers['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);}const response=await fetch(url,{method:'POST',headers,body:JSON.stringify({reviews,format})});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Export failed');}return response.blob();}async normalizeReviews(scrapedData,csvReviews){return this.request('/scraping/normalize',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({scraped_data:scrapedData,csv_reviews:csvReviews})});}// Usage tracking endpoints
async getUsageStats(){return this.request('/usage');}async getUsageHistory(service){const endpoint=service?"/usage/history?service=".concat(service):'/usage/history';return this.request(endpoint);}async getBillingReport(){return this.request('/usage/billing');}async getAdminUsage(){return this.request('/usage/admin');}// Assistant endpoints
async assistantGenerate(messages){return this.request('/assistant/generate',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({messages})});}async assistantSave(workflow,isTemplate){return this.request('/assistant/save',{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({workflow,isTemplate})});}}export const api=new ApiClient();export default api;
